data.title: Smile for Pete's Sake! - Offbeat Holiday Movies - The Indianapolis Public Library
data.meta_description: Smile for Pete's Sake! - Offbeat Holiday Movies by IndyPL_KaseyP - a staff-created list : Films that set a new standard for holiday traditions. Family, boobytraps, little green monsters, dudes in batsuits, and vault heists. Happy Holidays! #indypladults
data.text:
"There are two kinds of people in this world: people that think Die Hard is a Christmas movie. And people who are wrong." - My friend Nikki "There are two kinds of people in this world: people that think Die Hard is a Christmas movie. And people who are wrong." - My friend Nikki Show less

No one puts on a Turkey Day performance like Wednesday Addams. Nobody! No one puts on a Turkey Day performance like Wednesday Addams. Nobody! Show less

A little home invasion, a little kidnapping, a little couples therapy. Happy Holidays Mr. Jewel Thief! P.S. I'm aware that Kevin Spacey is in this movie. Don't watch it for him.
